About.Hours & facilities: Open Mon-Thurs 8:30am - 6pm and Fri 8:30am -5pm; closed Sat, Sun and all of January. Reference assistance available by mail and in person.

About.Acquisition focus: Material relating to the history of the Sydney Conservatorium of Music from 1916; all materials relating to Conservatorium activities and personnel (staff and students).

About.Major holdings: Sydney Conservatorium: Prospectus 1916- (1m) Concert programmes 1916- (4m) Photographs 1916- (2m) Correspondence 1916- (2m) Maps and plans 1916-(2m)
